title: Apparition
inscriptions: l.r. in paint: PREUSSER; verso u.l.: [Downtown Gallery label]; verso u.l. on label: 15 "APPARITION"/ BY ROBERT/ PREUSSER; verso u.l. in crayon: 15 [boxed]/ "A/ BY ROBERT PREUSSER/ FROM; verso c. crayon: 1761; verso c.r in crayon: ICHIG; verso u.c. in crayon: 982; verso c.: [artist's name crossed out]; verso c.r.: linen [illegible]
